  • Classes in com.tloj.game.collectables used by com.tloj.game.collectables
    Class
    Description
    Item
    An abstract class representing an item in the game
    All items have a weight, and can be picked up by the player
    Some items can be purchased, and some can be consumed to provide benefits to the player
  • Classes in com.tloj.game.collectables used by com.tloj.game.collectables.items
    Class
    Description
    ConsumableItem
    An interface representing an item that can be consumed in the game (e.g.
    Item
    An abstract class representing an item in the game
    All items have a weight, and can be picked up by the player
    Some items can be purchased, and some can be consumed to provide benefits to the player
    PurchasableItem
    An abstract class representing an item that can be purchased in the game via Merchant
    This class is meant to be extended by specific purchasable items, guaranteeing modularity
  • Classes in com.tloj.game.collectables used by com.tloj.game.collectables.weaponeffects
    Class
    Description
    Weapon
    An abstract class that represents a weapon that can be used to attack enemies
    Different weapons have different effects that are applied to the target when they are hit
    They are also equipped with a Dice that is rolled to determine the damage dealt to the target (in addition to the player's base damage stat).
  • Classes in com.tloj.game.collectables used by com.tloj.game.collectables.weapons
